Reviews.Title: “cheap, but not very cheerful”

Reviews.Content: ive returned 6 week stay legacy okay staff nice friendly accommodate wifi access pay extra location metro easy access onto zayed road size stayed bedroom apartment sized bedroom living kitchen bathrooms overall found apartment bit dated dark natural light furniture dark apartment clean properly dust furniture curtains filthy stains kitchen okay utensils twice bathroom running wall eeek didnt bad stay dont stay

Reviews.Content: apartments value dubai equipped kitchen comfy beds individual wifi hub apartment bad tv channels tvs lot difference deluxe standard standard maybe furniture apartments bathrooms living wardrobes space bedroom living months stay staff helpful friendly manager monthly rate highly recommend apartments 2 minute walk metro goes wrong apartment call reception guy comes fix half hour

Reviews.Title: “Not a bad experience, but should be a low budget option”
Reviews.Author: Mac1312
Reviews.Content: booked 3 night stay ebookers somehow checked booking sorted dinner accomodated aparthotel type tvs kitchen bed sitting etc iron ironing board available wifi free bathroom decent shower pressure temperature dodgy overall decor job brief weekend spend hole lot time staff friendly efficient despite initial issue booking eat look people restaurant service location dubai descriptive five minute taxi journey 5 minute metro ride dubai marina hand approximately 1015 minutes taxi cbd ie burj khalifa dubai mall etc access metro plus prepared taxis time beside internet city metro lot called dubai internet city approximately 60 ds airport £12 overall opinion summed follows business traveller company paying dont tourist fussed accomodation clean safe handy hotel bad id recommend basis

Reviews.Title: “It was amazing stay....Best location.....Best price.....best hospitality”
Reviews.Author: jamesscott186338
Reviews.Content: stayed 1week stay month star hotel price friendly staff help stay location saved hell money taxi dubai expensive dont drive metro advantage able reach morning office 15 minutes housekeeping reception restaurant staff courteous

Reviews.Title: “If you can choose another hotel!!!”
Reviews.Author: edbgsk
Reviews.Content: chance afford hotel strongly recommend hotels prices location convenient close metro station probably stay legacy everyday wakeup slept inside kitchen food smell strong sometimes smelling cigarette smoke coming air conditioning cleaning sometimes towels unbelievable hole middle rarely clean furniture remove dust sometimes cleaners didnt try call reception happened alleged checkout time clean review commented change services convenience instead daily cleaning changed 3 times week remove add tv channels basement parking looks storage furnitures fridge wash machines etcit doesnt looks hotelif choice hotel worth money dont care wellness

Reviews.Content: hotel exellent value money clean equiped store near fastfood serve breakfast extra 45 dirhams internet free 60 dirham 24 hours unless situated outskirt centre city attraction positive hotel metro rail station

Reviews.Title: “one of the best places if you have a car or free transportation”

Reviews.Content: stayed legacy apartments november 2008 january 2010 3 months period business apartments consists 1 separate comfortable bedroom bedrooms own bathrooms apartment living kitchen separated located sheikh zayed road 15 minutes city center transportation car free taxi strongly recommend apartments stay visited dubai june 2009 stayed own expense rates favorable comfortable internet free free networks building compare ibis hotel opinion hotels ps close mall emirates
